summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue West, from Grand Boulevard to Nickerson Street; and Grand Boulevard, from Twelfth Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, and crosses for the reasonable water service of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1445 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
